snippet.title: Miriel's Enchanted Mystery
snippet.description:
Miriel's Enchanted Mystery for PC: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/8400/miriels-enchanted-mystery/index.html

Miriel's Enchanted Mystery for Mac: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/8399/mac/miriels-enchanted-mystery/index.html

Unravel an intriguing mystery that starts when Miriel's grandmother finds a mysterious artifact hidden in her garden. What secrets does the artifact unlock and where does it take you? Build your own empire of magical shops and conjure up goods for your customers all over the magical realm in Miriel's Enchanted Mystery, a fun Time Management game. Upgrade your shops and cast powerful spells to keep your clientele content!

  * Powerful spells
  * Fun minigames
  * Unravel the mystery!
